## [5.0.0](https://www.github.com/yargs/y18n/compare/v4.0.0...v5.0.0) (2020-09-05)


### âš  BREAKING CHANGES

* exports maps are now used, which modifies import behavior.
* drops Node 6 and 4. begin following Node.js LTS schedule (#89)
